items.name: Fire Relic
items.description: A relic that contains the power of fire, used to thaw ice, scare off creatures, or provide warmth. Requires careful use to maintain trust with certain clans.

items.name: Leaf Amulet
items.description: An amulet carved from sacred leaves, allowing a deeper understanding of nature. Useful for interacting with animals or negotiating with the Leaf Clan.

items.name: Stone Pickaxe
items.description: A sturdy tool used for breaking through rocky paths or unearthing artifacts. Might require repairs after heavy use, often by the Pebble Clan.

items.name: Water Flask (Gloom Purified)
items.description: Contains purified water resistant to the Gloom's corruption. Used for healing blighted areas or purifying corrupted regions, but requires Water Clan resources.

items.name: Turtle Shell Charm
items.description: A protective charm carved from a turtle shell. Provides additional protection to NPCs during dangerous missions, though it risks being lost after use.

items.name: Ice Crystal
items.description: A shard of pure ice that can be used to cool heated arguments or solve puzzles related to heat. Highly valued by the Ice Clan.

items.name: Pebble of Strength
items.description: A symbolic pebble that provides a sense of unity and strength to those who carry it. Often used in negotiations with the Pebble Clan to establish common ground.

items.name: Sacred Leaf Bundle
items.description: A bundle of sacred leaves that can be used to treat injuries or protect crops. Highly respected by the Leaf Clan and useful for forging alliances.

items.name: Ember Stone
items.description: A small stone that glows with a faint warmth. Useful in interactions with the Fire Clan and can also provide comfort during harsh winters.

items.name: Frozen Dewdrop
items.description: A rare dewdrop frozen in time. Can be used to impress the Ice Clan or as an offering during specific rituals.

items.name: Gloom-Resistant Pesticide
items.description: A mixture that wards off pests and helps protect crops from Gloom contamination. Useful in dealing with the Leaf Clan’s pest issues.

items.name: Aurora Shard
items.description: A shard that glows with the colors of the aurora. Can be used to light up dark areas or as a sign of goodwill to the Ice Clan.

items.name: Gloom Sample
items.description: A contained sample of the Gloom, useful for studying its properties or negotiating with those who wish to understand it better.

items.name: River Stone
items.description: A smooth stone found in the river, representing adaptability and flow. Useful in negotiations with the Water Clan.

items.name: Flame Berry
items.description: A rare berry that burns with an inner fire. It can be used to ignite certain rituals or as a token of respect to the Fire Clan.

items.name: Seaweed Wrap
items.description: A bundle of seaweed that has healing properties. Often used by the Water Clan to help recover from injuries or as an offering to gain their favor.

items.name: Mystic Feather
items.description: A feather from a rare bird that can calm emotions. Useful during negotiations or when calming tensions between clans.

items.name: Frozen Heart Talisman
items.description: A talisman that symbolizes emotional control and resilience. Valued by the Ice Clan and useful during cold crises.

items.name: Flask of Ember Water
items.description: Water infused with the essence of fire, useful for thawing frozen areas without offending the Ice Clan as much as the Fire Relic would.

items.name: Gloom Ward
items.description: An enchanted object that provides temporary protection against Gloom corruption. Often used when exploring Gloom-infested areas.

items.name: Whispering Reed
items.description: A reed that makes a soft sound in the wind. Used to communicate across distances or send peaceful signals to other clans.

items.name: Glow Moss
items.description: A type of moss that glows faintly in the dark, used to navigate through dark areas or as a light source in negotiations.

items.name: River Lily
items.description: A flower that grows only in the purest waters. Represents peace and purity, often used in ceremonies or as an offering to gain trust.

items.name: Obsidian Mirror
items.description: A polished piece of obsidian that reflects truth. Used in diplomacy to prove honesty or expose deception.

items.name: Snowflake Charm
items.description: A charm that represents the uniqueness of each individual. Useful in negotiations with the Ice Clan to demonstrate respect for individuality.

items.name: Sun Stone
items.description: A stone that captures sunlight, used to brighten dark places or as a symbol of hope during difficult times.

items.name: Ashen Bark
items.description: Bark from a tree that survived a fire, representing resilience. Used in dealings with the Fire Clan or as a reminder of recovery.

items.name: Purity Pearl
items.description: A pearl symbolizing purity and clarity, often used in rituals to cleanse areas tainted by the Gloom.

items.name: Wind Chime of Unity
items.description: A chime that makes a calming sound in the wind, promoting peace during clan meetings and important gatherings.

items.name: Crystalized Fog
items.description: A mysterious crystal formed from condensed fog. Useful in solving puzzles that involve illusions or misleading paths.

items.name: Frozen Fern
items.description: A delicate fern encased in ice, representing balance between life and cold. Valued by the Ice Clan as a token of peace.

items.name: Tide Stone
items.description: A stone enchanted by the rhythm of the tides, used to invoke the Water Clan’s favor or regulate water flow.

items.name: Charcoal Etching Kit
items.description: Used to record symbols and relic findings, helpful for documenting progress in pushing back the Gloom or unlocking relic puzzles.

items.name: Leaf Relic
items.description: An ancient relic symbolizing growth and harmony with nature. It is highly valued by the Leaf Clan and can be used to strengthen bonds or heal parts of the land.

items.name: Pebble Relic
items.description: A relic that represents resilience and unity. The Pebble Clan sees it as a symbol of their heritage, and it can be used to foster alliances or bolster the spirit of the people.

items.name: Water Relic
items.description: A sacred relic that holds the power of water, symbolizing purification and adaptability. It can be used to clear Gloom-tainted areas or purify water sources.

items.name: Turtle Relic
items.description: A relic carved in the shape of a turtle, representing stability and protection. It can be used to protect the village or to gain the favor of the Turtle Clan.

items.name: Ice Relic
items.description: A relic of the Ice Clan, symbolizing endurance and control over the cold. It can be used to quell disputes, cool dangerous situations, or fortify the frozen regions.
